data.title: Who is Amy Schneider's wife? Relationship timeline, dating history
data.meta_description: WHO IS AMY SCHNEIDER'S WIFE? People have been wondering about Amy's marital life. Others have even been questioning her sexuality. Find out more about her.
data.text:
Amy Schneider is an American engineering manager and game show contestant known for featuring in the popular television game show Jeopardy. Aside from that, she is a smart and confident transgender woman whose dating life has elicited great curiosity among her fans. As a result, many of her fans are asking the big question, "Who is Amy Schneider's wife?"

Relationship stories are some of the juiciest topics about celebrities. Fortunately, most of them tend to be open about their relationships. Amy Schneider, for instance, had previously been married before she met her current girlfriend. Here is everything you need to know about her dating history.

Amy Schneider's profile summary

Birth name Thomas E Schneider.Now known asAmy SchneiderGenderFemaleDate of birthMay 29 1984 Age37 years old (as of 2022) Zodiac signTaurusPlace of birthDayton, Ohio, United StatesCurrent residenceOakland, California, United StatesNationalityAmericanEthnicityWhiteReligionChristianitySexualityTransgenderHeight in feet5'6Height in centimetres168Weight in pounds57Weight in kilograms125Hair colourBlondeEye colourBrownRelationship statusDatingGirlfriendGenevieve Davis Ex-spouseKeely Anneken FatherJames T. SchneiderSiblings John SchneiderProfessionEngineering manager, game show contestantNet worth$2 million

Who is Amy Schneider's wife?

Despite being a well-known personality, her love life has also made headlines through the years. So who has the game show contestant been involved with in the past? Here is a brief history of the people she has been linked to.

Keely Anneken

Amy Schneider was married to a woman named Keely Anneken, a content designer, before she discovered her sexuality. The ex-couple first met in 2004 during the production of The Taming of the Shrew. They immediately fell in love, and after a while, they started dating. They eventually got married in the same year. In a remarkable disclosure about how they met Schneider said:

We visited some friends who were attending Berkeley and fell in love with the Bay Area. So we moved to Oakland in 2009, and I, for one, never wanted to leave.

2016: Keely Anneken and Schneider divorce

After their marriage, they moved to Oakland, California, in 2009. Unfortunately, their union did not last long, as they called it quits in 2016 after being together for close to 12 years. Even though they ended their relationship, they are still on good terms and talk positively about each other.

Genevieve Davis

Genevieve Davis and Amy Schneider first met in July 2020 through a friend. Their first meeting, however, did not usher them to romantic dates, but instead, they remained friends until February 2021. She opened up about her experience when she met Genevieve by saying:

Now, I'd never really believed in love at first sight, and maybe I'm just retroactively projecting my feelings back onto that encounter, but I swear I knew when she walked in the door that she was going to be in my life for a long time.

2021: First relationship blossoms

The couple entered into a relationship in 2021, roughly seven months after their first encounter. After that, Genevieve Davis and Amy would be frequently spotted together enjoying each other's company.

In the same year, Genevieve bought Amy a gift in the form of a necklace on her first birthday after the duo started their relationship. Amy cherishes the necklace so much that she wears it everywhere she goes, as it reminds her of their friendship.

2022: Engagement ring

The famous game show personality and her girlfriend got engaged early this year on February 24. Their engagement took place in a private ceremony when they were on a romantic getaway. Genevieve proposed to her new girlfriend, and they both shared their engagement on their social media platforms.

I have an announcement: Genevieve is no longer my girlfriend... she's my fianc√©e!!! I couldn't be happier or more proud to spend my life with the very best person in the entire world.

The couple is yet to say their wedding vows. Their relationship is growing from strength to strength, and chances are that it will culminate into marriage.

Is Amy Schneider trans?

Is Amy Schneider a man? Amy was born a male, and her birth name is Thomas E Schneider. However, in 2016 Amy discovered herself as a transwoman and opted to undergo s*x alteration surgery to become a naturalized woman. The following year, she changed her name from Thomas after completing her gender transition.

Quick facts about Amy Schneider

Who is Amy Schneider? She is an American engineering manager and game show contestant. She is widely recognized for featuring in the popular television game show Jeopardy.

How old is Amy Schneider? The famous actress is 37 years old as of 2022. She was born on 29 May 1984, in Dayton, Ohio, United States.

What is Amy Schneider's net worth? According to Popular Networth, her net worth is estimated to be $2 million. However, this information is not official.

How tall is Amy Schneider? She is 5 feet 6 inches or 168 centimetres and weighs about 125 pounds or 57 kilograms.

Who is Amy Schneider's girlfriend? She has been dating Genevieve Davis since 2021.

Is Amy Schneider a man? Amy Schneider from jeopardy before surgery was a man. However, she later transformed into a woman in 2017 after undergoing s*x alteration surgery.

Who is Amy Schneider's wife has been a subject of interest among her fans, especially after her divorce from Keely Anneken. She is currently dating a woman named Genevieve Davis. The two are currently living together in Oakland, California, United States.

Tuko.co.ke published an article about Willy Adames' bio, wife, salary, parents, hometown, and net worth. He is a well-known Dominican professional baseball shortstop presently playing for the Milwaukee Brewers of Major League Baseball.

He started his baseball career in 2012 when he was drafted into the Detroit Tigers as an international free agent. However, his big break came in 2018 when he made his MLB debut with Tampa Bay Rays. In 2021 he joined Milwaukee Brewers.
